name: Don't Pull It Out
description:
A long time ago, my people moved into the underground because of the violence of the world. A few years after, we needed someone strong to go see what the world had become. It was awful and I got stabbed by a little elf out there. I had no other choice but to come back to my people, however the sword in my chest was kind of a problem. I needed a fast way to go home, the dwarven elevator seemed like the best idea, but it’s really dangerous because of the hundreds of monsters living there. I didn’t want to die because of blood loss, but pulling the sword out would have been suicide, I would have bleed out. I knew that monsters hate human blood, so maybe if I stabbed myself a bit deeper, and a bit deeper I could survive long enough and find my people. I only knew I had to try.

----------

Controls

"Space key" : Dash

"Enter" : Stab Yourself

"E" : PowerUp

----------

This was my second Jam and it's only my third game, but it was great to do the Jam. Theme was : "Deeper and Deeper"

The Game is too difficult for now, that will change with patches
